mapper.select: select TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') stt_date, count(*) success from real_call_info where r_time_stamp BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')||'000000' and TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')||'999999' union all SELECT SUBSTR(s_date, 0,6) stt_date , case when TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'DD') = '01' then 0 else sum(R_STT_SUCCESS) end success FROM statistics_all_t WHERE s_date BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE -1, 'YYYYMM') || '00000000' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE -1, 'YYYYMMDD')||'999999' GROUP BY SUBSTR(s_date, 0,6)

SELECT SUBSTR(s_date, 0,8) s_date , sum(N_CTRL_SUCCESS) n_ctrl_success, sum(N_CTRL_FAIL) n_ctrl_fail, sum(N_STT_SUCCESS) n_stt_success, sum(N_STT_FAIL) n_stt_fail, sum(N_STT_RETRY) n_stt_retry, sum(N_TA_SUCCESS) n_ta_success, sum(N_TA_FAIL) n_ta_fail, sum(R_RT_SUCCESS) r_rt_success, sum(R_RT_FAIL) r_rt_fail, sum(R_STT_SUCCESS) r_stt_success, sum(R_STT_FAIL) r_stt_fail, sum(R_TA_SUCCESS) r_ta_success, sum(R_TA_FAIL) r_ta_fail, sum(N_STT_FAIL) etc_cnt FROM statistics_all_t WHERE s_date BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1 - 5/24/60, 'YYYYMMDD') || '999999' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 5/24/60, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MI') GROUP BY SUBSTR(s_date, 0,8) UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTR(s_date, 0,6) s_date, sum(N_CTRL_SUCCESS) n_ctrl_success, sum(N_CTRL_FAIL) n_ctrl_fail, sum(N_STT_SUCCESS) n_stt_success, sum(N_STT_FAIL) n_stt_fail, sum(N_STT_RETRY) n_stt_retry, sum(N_TA_SUCCESS) n_ta_success, sum(N_TA_FAIL) n_ta_fail, sum(R_RT_SUCCESS) r_rt_success, sum(R_RT_FAIL) r_rt_fail, sum(R_STT_SUCCESS) r_stt_success, sum(R_STT_FAIL) r_stt_fail, sum(R_TA_SUCCESS) r_ta_success, sum(R_TA_FAIL) r_ta_fail, sum(N_STT_FAIL) etc_cnt FROM statistics_all_t WHERE s_date BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 5/24/60, 'YYYYMM') || '00000000' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 5/24/60, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MI') GROUP BY SUBSTR(s_date, 0,6) UNION ALL select z.* from ( select A.s_date, A.n_ctrl_success, A.n_ctrl_fail, A.n_stt_success, A.n_stt_fail, A.n_stt_retry, A.n_ta_success, A.n_ta_fail, A.r_rt_success, A.r_rt_fail, A.r_stt_success, A.r_stt_fail, A.r_ta_success, A.r_ta_fail, A.n_stt_fail etc_cnt FROM statistics_all_t A where s_date <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 5/24/60, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MI') order by A.s_date DESC )z where ROWNUM = 1

select count(*) stt_user, sum(B.CALL_STATUS) calling_user from ( select orgid from wfms_org where orgid in ('1') UNION all select orgid from wfms_org where porgid in (select orgid from wfms_org where orgid in ('250', '251', '252'))) A join wfms_user B on A.orgid = B.orgid and B.stt_use_yn = 'Y' UNION all select count(*) stt_user, sum(B.CALL_STATUS) calling_user from ( select orgid from wfms_org where orgid in ('2') UNION all select orgid from wfms_org where porgid in (select orgid from wfms_org where orgid in ('250', '251', '252'))) A join wfms_user B on A.orgid = B.orgid and B.stt_use_yn = 'Y'
